snippet.title: Last Time I Saw You - Teaser
snippet.description:
Last Time I Saw You is a 2D, fully hand-drawn coming-of-age narrative adventure, set in a lush and vibrant ‘80s Japan. 

Follow the story of Ayumi, a 12-year-old boy who wanders the melancholic countryside of Japan in search of the mysterious girl he has been seeing in his dreams, who may have also cast a curse upon his town...

Coming to PC and consoles in 2024.

- - - - -
Developer: Maboroshi Artworks
Publisher: Chorus Worldwide
- - - - -

Wishlist the game and play the demo on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1909750/Last_Time_I_Saw_You/
Follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/MaboroshiArt
Check our socials!
https://linktr.ee/maboroshiartworks

www.maboroshiartworks.com
